channel.title: Participatory Mapping on QField - Efficient field work built for QGIS
channel.description: Recent content in Participatory Mapping on QField - Efficient field work built for QGIS

item.title: QField for Citizen Science and Participatory Mapping
item.description:
What you can do

  • Community mapping and local surveys
  • Environmental observations and reporting
  • Collaborative data projects with oversight

Works with QGIS and QFieldCloud

Set up data models in QGIS and coordinate contributors via QFieldCloud.
